column1: #Text=Main Aang Appa Fong Iroh Katara Momo Sokka Zuko Antagonists Azula Azula 's ship captain says : " Minor Fang Kuruk ( flashback only ) Kyoshi ( flashback only ) Lo and Li Pakku Roku Yangchen ( flashback only ) Szeto ( flashback only ) " Katara says : " We found a printer to make our posters ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " Hey , I thought designing the lost Appa poster was my job .
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is his head .
#Text=" Katara says : " Why are feet coming out of it ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Those are his horns .
#Text=I have n't seen him in a while , okay ?
#Text=" Toph says : " It looks just like him to me !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Thank you , I worked really - Why do you feel the need to do that ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Let 's just stick with the professional version .
#Text=" Aang says : " Come on , let 's get busy !
